t:
My wife jumped and hugged me tightly and exclaimed,
         “I missed you, darling!”


Pinned to the ground, I desperately tried to push away her rotting corpse.
c:
What's worse? Getting hugged by your dead wife, or getting an erection because of that.



#hugday #wife #dead #reanimate #ghost #missing
